General.Name: Ampli SA w upadlosci ukladowej
General.Description: Ampli S.A. engages in the wholesale and retail of electric materials in Poland. The company offers light sources; induction fixtures and LED luminaires; and control systems for use in production and storage halls, streets, and buildings. Ampli S.A. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Tarnów, Poland.
